titles.title: Recognizing the 100th anniversary of the American Thoracic Society, celebrating its achievements, and encouraging the society to continue its guidance on lung-related health issues to the peoples of the United States and of the world.

Recognizing the 100th anniversary of the American Thoracic Society, celebrating its achievements, and encouraging the society to continue its guidance on lung-related health issues to the peoples of the United States and of the world.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Recognizes the American Thoracic Society on its 100th anniversary for its scientific, clinical, and public health achievements and its impact on improving lung-related health.
